alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay, southern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 312 PM EDT/212 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles north of Lynn Haven to 14 miles east of Santa Rosa Beach to 6 miles east of Niceville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Santa Rosa Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Eglin Air Force Base, Parker, Freeport, Ebro, Villa Tasso, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Blue Mountain Beach, West Panama City, Seaside and Bahama Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
